name: One Puzzle Game
description:
Explication:

Hi, this is a very, very simple puzzle game maked with Unity. There are a lots of scenaries, that you can explore, or only solve the puzzle.  Also a lots of objects of the scenary can be moved, and create other things. The first map are small, but the next levels increases the dificulty, and the size of the map. 

Warning:

This is a Alfa of the Alfa of One Puzzle Game, for the moments don't have puzzles, wait for the next update TK.

Controls:

E = Grab objects

Q = Drop objects

Mouse = Look around

Mouse Right Click = Zoom 

W, A, S, D = Move

Mouse Left Click = Throw Objects
